name: EKEventEditViewController
desc: A view controller for creating, editing, and deleting calendar events.

items.name: var editViewDelegate: EKEventEditViewDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate to notify when editing an event.

items.name: protocol EKEventEditViewDelegate
items.desc: A notification sent to the delegate when the user finishes editing an event.

items.name: var event: EKEvent?
items.desc: The event the user creates or edits using this view controller.

items.name: var eventStore: EKEventStore!
items.desc: The event store used to save the event.

items.name: func cancelEditing()
items.desc: Ends the editing session and discards any changes that were made to the event.
